EmailTemplate.name: 02-10-22 HOS eWeekly Newsletter.Email 1 02-10-22 HOS
EmailTemplate.subject: Open Order Status Report Delay
EmailTemplate.textOnly: February 10, 2022 Open Order Status Report Delay We have been experiencing data discrepancies in our Open Order Status Reports. To avoid providing you with incorrect information, we will be postponing reports until the issue has been fixed. We apologize for any inconvenience and will work to reinstate this report as soon as possible. Latest Primer Blogs Have you subscribed to NCR Primer blogs? The latest article covers the 5 reports restaurants should consider to help run their restaurant. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
